name: @rbxts/string-builder

scripts.setup-rokit: rokit trust lune-org/lune && rokit trust rojo-rbx/rojo && rokit install
scripts.test: npm run build -- -p tests && rojo build tests -o tests/test-environment.rbxl && lune run tests tests/test-environment.rbxl

author: runicly
description: StringBuilder class for Roblox that creates strings from tables
